properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:03AM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Period of Freezing Drizzle Expected This Morning...

* WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of a
light glaze to a few hundredths of an inch.

* WHERE...Portions of northeast Illinois, including the north and
west suburbs of Chicago. Near lakeside areas will likely remain
above freezing the entire morning, thus diminishing the threat
there.

* WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to noon CST today.

* IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are
possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the latter part
of the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL NOTES...Areas of fog are possible away from the lake
this morning and some of this may cause patchy slick spots as
well.
properties.instruction:
while traveling, especially on untreated surfaces.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST TODAY
